messages.title: Straight talking. Vote UKIP
messages.content: I have never believed that we, as an independent, island nation had any part to play in the European political community. We were misled into joining and we must pull out before we are totally overwhelmed. It is long past time we were a FREE COUNTRY once again with the ability to make our own laws according to our traditions and culture.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Say YES to referendums on all major issues.
Say NO to wasting £45 million a day in Brussels.

issues.brexitEurope: We must pull out before we are totally overwhelmed.
issues.governance: I have never believed that we, as an independent, island nation had any part to play in the European political community.
